title: OCE Beginner Players Wanted for Clash
body:
I'm dying to play Clash but I don't know anyone who is also playing. I basically started playing league a few months ago after eyeing it for sometime and I've been obsessed ever since. I want to play Clash but all the higher elo teams don't want someone who is unranked and all the lower elo teams are full...
I usually support main but I can also mid or jg

replies.body: That's actually really helpful, I think I'm going to start ranked but I'm worried that I'm going to be stuck in bronze until next season if I start now...

I mean that's always going to be a risk. The skill differential in Bronze is big, and players are *very* inconsistent, so it makes it difficult to climb unless you are significantly better than the rank you have. Fresh account typically get placed in the B2-S4 range, but if you drop now (lack of experience, exposure, consistency. You've only been playing a very short time after all) then it will certainly make it harder to climb next season when you get placed lower than your end of season rank.

Clash doesn't have to be super srs, it depends largely on what you and your team expect from it, and as a team you can come to that agreement, but in ranked (esp solo/duo) the expectations are a little different, so while you might be happy to be placed for the sake of clash, you might not want to be placed for the sake of ranked.
For the record you do have to have done at least your placements (in SR) to play clash. I don't know if you can even join a team on an unranked account tbh.
